articles.title: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5060 Ti with 8GB memory is far behind 16GB model in gaming performance, review shows - VideoCardz.com
articles.description: GeForce RTX 5060 Ti with 8GB memory tested: 16GB version up to 589% faster in 1% FPS LOW NVIDIA did their best to bury the reviews of the GeForce RTX 5060 Ti 8 GB by instructing board partners not to send samples of that graphics card to the media. This was a…

articles.title: Exclusive: Anthropic warns fully AI employees are a year away - Axios
articles.description: Managing those AI identities will require companies to completely reassess their cybersecurity strategies.

articles.title: Duolingo is getting a chess course - The Verge
articles.description: Duolingo is testing a new chess course with a “limited number of learners” and will continue to roll it out on iOS in English in the “coming weeks.”

articles.title: Nintendo Announces Official Pre-Order Date for the Switch 2 — Everything You Need to Know About When and Where to Buy - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The next generation of Nintendo consoles is coming soon — here's where to pre-order and buy the Switch 2 for summer 2025.

articles.title: All Heroes And Abilities In Overwatch 2 Stadium Mode - GameSpot
articles.description: Overwatch 2's new competitive mode, called Stadium, features a smaller roster of heroes with special perks and abilities you can buy during a match.
